name: Enionax
description:
Enionax is sent back to 1980 — the dawning of video games — due to a mistake.

A classic plateformer 2D game

Help her come back to our time by going through the various levels/eras of platformers.
You will have to walk through various supports to come back to our time in this platefomer 2D game.

Assets


  • A classic plateformer 2D game !
  • Revisit the various eras of video games with humour.
  • Try to find out all the easter eggs in the game.
  • Go through various gameplays as times change.
  • Enjoy original music by Valentin Skorra.
